Class Fraction

  • java.lang.Object
    • Fraction

  • public class Fraction
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Brian L. McMichael Creates a fraction object with get and set functions for numerators and denominators. All numerators and denominators are held as double values.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Fraction()
      Creates a fraction equal to 1.
      Fraction(double numerator, double denominator) 
      Fraction(int numerator, int denominator)
